subject: Fwd: DCS Group
preview: Help Heath understand how they’re doing:

full_threads.body:
Hi Ben, 


Yes we have on boarded the 4 sites you have sent us logins to. Here are the testing links:


https://debthelpline.kinsta.com/
https://dcsgroup.kinsta.com/
https://debtmediators.kinsta.com/
https://solutions2debt.kinsta.com/


Let me know when you would like us to go live and I can send you the details or alternatively, you can send us your Domain Name logins and we can make the changes for you. 


Also, are you able to send through the logins for the final site?  


Thanks and speak soon,

Are we all good to flick our DNS over?


Can you shoot me a link to the websites for testing before we go live?


Regards,



Ben Paris | Debt Agreement Administrator
P: 1300 780 367 | F: 1300 329 327
PO Box 3074, Newstead QLD 4006


Trust, Freedom, Understanding.






This e-mail is sent by DCS Group Aust Pty Ltd ACN 123 770 267 or one of its related entities "DCS". DCS may be contacted at PO Box 3074, Newstead, QLD 4006 or on 1300 725 052 or at dcsgroup.com.au. Yeah, don’t copy them.


Regards,



Ben Paris | Debt Agreement Administrator

PO Box 3074, Newstead QLD 4006

Hi Ben, 


We have managed to access with your logins, thank you. 


I have noticed that these are over 7,000 users registered. Going by the name and email addresses they look spammy. Were you aware of these? I'm thinking it would be best to not copy them across to the new site. Are you ok with that? Thanks,

Heath Maguire
Director

E. heath@wpperk.com | P. 1300 072 134 | M. 0415 162 271

Sent: Thursday, 19 April 2018 10:38 AM
To: Ben Paris
Subject: Re: DCS Group

Hi Ben,

Thank your for signing up - We are excited to have you on board!

To get started we will need:

  • ‘Administrator’ access to each of the WordPress installations. In most cases, we can migrate your site from within there. If we need a deeper level of access, I will let you know.
  • The logins for each domain name once (this is secondary and not as urgent).

If you need any help with either of the above, please let me know.

Thanks and speak soon,

Heath Maguire
Director

E. heath@wpperk.com | P. 1300 072 134 | M. 0415 162 271

On 13 Apr 2018, at 12:05 pm, Heath Maguire <heath@wpperk.com> wrote:

Hi Ben,

Further to my last email, we have now run the 5 below sites through some preliminary benchmark tests to assess:

  • If the have SSL certificates installed and working (all good news on this one!)
  • Their speed (4/5 of the sites need some help)
  • Their performance optimisation (4/5 sites also need some help here)

These are all areas that will be addressed as part of our onboarding process. Please see the attached high-level breakdown and let me know any questions you may have?

Thanks and speak soon,

Heath Maguire
Director

E. heath@wpperk.com | P. 1300 072 134 | M. 0415 162 271

https://wpperk.com/email-sig/wpperk-email-logo.png

<dcsgroup-websites-prelim-review.xlsx>

On 12 Apr 2018, at 9:33 am, Heath Maguire <heath@wpperk.com> wrote:

Hi Ben,

Thanks for the below, we have had a look (from a front end perspective) at your websites and I recommend our Perk Professional plan for each site.

This will enable us to do a full onboard and identify any issues (performance, security and optimisations) as well as send you a consolidated monthly report with all changes made during the previous period.

To sign up, you can go to this page: https://wpperk.com/sign-up/ and select the PERK PROFESSIONAL option. On the check out page, we will ask you for the web addresses and you can increase the quantity to 5.

Note, if you pay annually you get a free month for each site… a total saving of $1,250.00.

Once you sign up, you will receive an email with the next steps. We will be able to get your sites changed over to our servers by mid next week at the latest. Let me know if you have any questions?

I look forward to working with you guys!

Thanks and speak soon,

Heath Maguire
Director

E. heath@wpperk.com | P. 1300 072 134 | M. 0415 162 271

https://wpperk.com/email-sig/wpperk-email-logo.png
